mapper.select: SELECT a.ifcgSeq, a.ifcgName, a.ifcgUseNy, a.ifcgOrder, a.ifcgDelNy, a.ifcgDesc, a.regDateTime, a.regDateTimeRevise FROM newjeans.codegroup a ORDER BY a.ifcgSeq desc
mapper.insert: insert into codegroup ( ifcgName, ifcgUseNy, ifcgOrder, ifcgDelNy, ifcgDesc, regDateTime, regDateTimeRevise ) values ( #{ifcgName}, #{ifcgUseNy}, #{ifcgOrder}, #{ifcgDelNy}, #{ifcgDesc}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT a.ifcgSeq, a.ifcgName, a.ifcgUseNy, a.ifcgOrder, a.ifcgDelNy, a.ifcgDesc, a.regDateTime, a.regDateTimeRevise FROM newjeans.codegroup a WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE codegroup SET ifcgName = #{ifcgName}, ifcgUseNy = #{ifcgUseNy}, ifcgOrder = #{ifcgOrder}, ifcgDelNy = #{ifcgDelNy}, ifcgDesc = #{ifcgDesc}, regDateTimeRevise = now() WHERE 1=1 AND ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
